H0.text: The cranium is the name of the skull that covers the brain and protects it.

H1.text: Cerebrum is the name of the skull that covers the brain and protects it.

H2.text: The nasal bone is the name of the skull that covers the brain and protects it.

H3.text: Mandible is the name of the skull that covers the brain and protects it.

A4.text: The skull, or cranium, is a bony enclosure around the brain of a vertebrate.

A5.text: The skull protects the brain from damage through its high resistance to deformation; the skull is one of the least deformable structures found in nature.
